mapper.sql: id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, apply_code, del_flag, product_code, product_name, product_category_code, product_category_name, sku_code, spec, unit_code, product_property_code, product_property_name, product_brand_code, product_brand_name, sku_abbreviation, color_code, color_name, model_number, unit_name, quality_assurance_management, product_sort_code, product_sort_name, quality_number, quality_date, management_style_code, management_style_name, categories_supply_channels_code, on_sale, categories_supply_channels_name, box_gauge, applicable_month_age, point, bar_code, mnemonic_code, selection_effective_time, selection_effective_start_time, selection_effective_end_time, goods_gifts, sku_name, apply_status, auditor_by, auditor_time, is_main_push, new_product, manufacturer_guide_price, zero_removal_coefficient, procurement_section_code, procurement_section_name, form_no, company_code,company_name,warehouse_type_code,warehouse_type_name,remark,apply_type,apply_type_name, use_time,unique_code,inventory_model,inventory_allocation,price_model,sku_status,product_desc
mapper.select:
select
from apply_product_sku where sku_code = #{skuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and apply_status in (0,1)
select distinct form_no from apply_product_sku where apply_code = #{applyCode}

select a.apply_type, a.apply_type_name, a.sku_code, a.sku_name, a.product_brand_code, a.product_brand_name, a.product_category_code, CONCAT(lv1.category_name,'-',lv2.category_name,'-',lv3.category_name,'-',lv4.category_name) product_category_name, a.product_code, a.product_name, a.create_time, a.create_by, a.update_time, a.update_by, a.apply_code, a.apply_status, a.form_no, a.auditor_by, a.auditor_time, a.selection_effective_time, a.selection_effective_start_time, a.change_content, a.approval_remark from apply_product_sku a LEFT JOIN product_category lv4 on lv4.category_id = a.product_category_code LEFT JOIN product_category lv3 on lv3.category_id = lv4.parent_id LEFT JOIN product_category lv2 on lv2.category_id = lv3.parent_id LEFT JOIN product_category lv1 on lv1.category_id = lv2.parent_id where a.apply_code = #{applyCode}

select case when a.apply_type = 1 then '新增' when a.apply_type = 2 then '修改' end applyType, case when a.goods_gifts = 0 then '商品' when a.goods_gifts = 1 then '赠品' end goodsGifts, a.sku_code skuCode, a.sku_name skuName, a.product_name productName, a.product_category_name productCategoryName, a.product_brand_name productBrandName, a.product_property_name productPropertyName, g.settlement_method_name settlementMethodName, a.manufacturer_guide_price manufacturerGuidePrice, j.tax_included_price taxIncludedPrice, i2.price_tax aiqinDistributionPrice, i3.price_tax mengbeishuDistributionPrice, i8.price_tax xiaohongmaDistributionPrice, i5.price_tax aiqinChannelPrice, i6.price_tax mengbeishuChannelPrice, i7.price_tax xiaohongmaChannelPrice, h.price_tax salePrice, i.price_tax memberPrice, g.output_tax_rate outputTaxRate, g.Input_tax_rate inputTaxRate, a.color_name colorName, a.model_number modelNumber, case when a.quality_assurance_management = 0 then '是' when a.quality_assurance_management = 1 then '否' end qualityAssuranceManagement, a.quality_date qualityDate, case when a.quality_number = 1 then '天' when a.quality_number = 2 then '月' when a.quality_number = 3 then '年' end qualityNumber, a.applicable_month_age applicableMonthAge, case when a.unique_code = 0 then '是' when a.unique_code = 1 then '否' end uniqueCode, j.supply_unit_name supplyUnitName, c.spec spec, c.unit_name unitName, l.base_product_content inBaseProductContent, f.zero_removal_coefficient zeroRemovalCoefficient, e.sales_code salesCode, a.change_content changeContent, a.approval_remark approvalRemark, a.approval_name approvalName, a.create_by createBy, a.create_time createTime, a.update_time updateTime, a.update_by updateBy, a.apply_status applyStatus, a.form_no formNo, a.apply_code applyCode, a.auditor_by auditorBy, a.auditor_time auditorTime, a.selection_effective_end_time selectionEffectiveEndTime, a.selection_effective_start_time selectionEffectiveStartTime, group_concat(m.price_channel_name) coverage, a.procurement_section_name purchaseGroupName from apply_product_sku a left join apply_product_sku_stock_info c on a.sku_code = c.product_sku_code and a.apply_code = c.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_box_packing d on d.unit_code = c.unit_code and d.product_sku_code = a.sku_code and a.apply_code = d.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_sales_info e on e.product_sku_code = a.sku_code and e.is_default = 1 and a.apply_code = e.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_distribution_info f on a.sku_code = f.product_sku_code and a.apply_code = f.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_checkout g on g.sku_code = a.sku_code and a.apply_code = g.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_price_info h on h.sku_code = a.sku_code and h.price_item_code = '1013' and a.apply_code = h.apply_code #售价 left join apply_product_sku_price_info i on i.sku_code = a.sku_code and i.price_item_code = '1014' and a.apply_code = i.apply_code #会员价 left join apply_product_sku_supply_unit j on j.product_sku_code = a.sku_code and j.is_default = 1 and a.apply_code = j.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_price_info i2 on i2.sku_code = a.sku_code and i2.price_item_code = '1007' and a.apply_code = i2.apply_code #爱亲分销价 left join apply_product_sku_price_info i3 on i3.sku_code = a.sku_code and i3.price_item_code = '1008' and a.apply_code = i3.apply_code #萌贝树分销价 left join apply_product_sku_price_info i5 on i5.sku_code = a.sku_code and i5.price_item_code = '1001' and a.apply_code = i5.apply_code #爱亲渠道价 left join apply_product_sku_price_info i6 on i6.sku_code = a.sku_code and i6.price_item_code = '1002' and a.apply_code = i6.apply_code #萌贝树渠道价 left join apply_product_sku_price_info i7 on i7.sku_code = a.sku_code and i7.price_item_code = '1003' and a.apply_code = i7.apply_code #小红马渠道价 left join apply_product_sku_price_info i8 on i8.sku_code = a.sku_code and i8.price_item_code = '1009' and a.apply_code = i8.apply_code #小红马分销价 left join apply_product_sku_manufacturer k on a.sku_code = k.product_sku_code and k.is_default = 1 and a.apply_code = k.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_purchase_info l on l.product_sku_code = a.sku_code and a.apply_code = l.apply_code left join apply_product_sku_channel m on m.sku_code = a.sku_code and a.apply_code = m.apply_code where a.apply_code = #{applyCode} group by a.sku_code
select count(0) from apply_product_sku where product_brand_code = #{brandCode} and apply_status in (0,1)
select count(0) from apply_product_sku where product_category_code = #{categoryCode} and apply_status in (0,1)

select count(*) from apply_product_sku where 1=1 and apply_status = 1
and sku_code != #{skuCode}

select
from apply_product_sku where selection_effective_time = 0 and selection_effective_end_time is null and apply_status = 2 and selection_effective_start_time <= now()

mapper.update:
update apply_product_sku set apply_status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditor_by = #{auditorBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditor_time = #{auditorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1
AND form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
